titleInfo.title: Merle Haggard and Bonnie Owens at the KRNT Theaters

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black on yellow) announcing Merle Haggard, Bonnie Owens and the Strangers, Ernest Tubb and the Troubadours at the KRNT theater on May 2. Poster features metal photoplates of Merle Haggard, Bonnie Owens and Ernest Tubb.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
